Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Pfizer is not part of Operation Warp Speed, when in fact they accepted government funds for supply and distribution of their vaccine.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that being part of Operation Warp Speed is the only measure of involvement or support from the US government, disregarding the fact that Pfizer collaborated with BioNTech and received government funds for other aspects of the vaccine development and distribution.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to back up the assertion that Pfizer is not part of Operation Warp Speed.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that while Pfizer may not have been involved in the initial research and development phase of Operation Warp Speed, they did collaborate with BioNTech and receive government funds for other aspects of the vaccine production and distribution.
